title: Hackers might even harvest the
extract: Definition: Hacking is an attempt to exploit a computer system or a private network inside a computer. Simply put, it is the unauthorised access to or control over computer network security systems for some illicit purpose. ... They can destroy, steal or even prevent authorized users from accessing the system.Jan 25, 2016
extract_html: Definition: Hacking is an attempt to exploit a computer system or a private network inside a computer.
